sentences.en: Clinical process divides typical armour hepatitis a phase: is preclinical, prodrome period, is icteric period, convalescence.
sentences.cn: 典型的甲型肝炎临床过程分四个阶段: 潜伏期, 前驱症状期, 黄疸期, 恢复期.

sentences.en: It is prodrome respectively period, foreboding period, convulsion period, atony lethargy period and recognizant convalescence.
sentences.cn: 分别是前驱症状期、 先兆期、痉挛期、弛缓昏睡期和意识恢复期。

sentences.en: Objective: This paper reviews the influence of rescue medications administered in the prodrome on the prevention of psychotic relapse in remitted schizophrenia patients.
sentences.cn: 目的：本文回顾了有关给予缓解期精神分裂症病人前驱症状救护性治疗对预防精神病复发的影响。
